content.question: The function <math alttext="g"><mi>g</mi></math> is given by <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals fraction numerator 1 plus sin x over denominator cos x end fraction"><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mpadded lspace="+2px"><mi>x</mi></mpadded></mrow></mfrac></math>. On the interval <math alttext="open square brackets 0 comma 2 pi close square brackets"><mfenced close="]" open="["><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>, what are all zeros of <math alttext="g"><mi>g</mi></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="g"><mi>g</mi></math> has no zeros on the interval <math alttext="open square brackets 0 comma 2 pi close square brackets"><mfenced close="]" open="["><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>.

<math alttext="x equals 0"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>, <math alttext="x equals pi"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>π</mi></math>, and <math alttext="x equals 2 pi"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></math>

<math alttext="x equals pi over 2"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math> and <math alttext="x equals fraction numerator 3 pi over denominator 2 end fraction"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>
<math alttext="x equals fraction numerator 3 pi over denominator 2 end fraction"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math> only

content.answer: <math alttext="g"><mi>g</mi></math> has no zeros on the interval <math alttext="open square brackets 0 comma 2 pi close square brackets"><mfenced close="]" open="["><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Solve equations and inequalities represented analytically, with and without technology.
